title: can't delete autofill unwanted suggestion from form history after firefox update
content: since the last update (firefox 127.0 or 127.0.1), i can't delete unwanted suggestion from autofil history anymore (the right search engine tool bar words with the clock icon or any website search bar) each time i want to delete the unwanted word, it reappear immediately after in the suggestion list.
creator: thor94

title: A nag screen keeps coming to my screen
content: Since a few days ago, this screen has been popping up, even when I haven't opened Firefox browser yet. It happens several times a day... If you need to run any tool in my PC, you guys have a go. Please just let me know. I will be glad to help, in case this problem is happening to others
creator: jamm2005us
